Title: Socket
Description: ['The main character is a woman that has electric current on her body. She is very lonely and nobody approaches her. Till, one day, a little boy is not afraid of her, and they turn friends.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Hataraku Saibou', 'Other: Hataraku Saibou', 'Side story: Hataraku Saibou: Kaze Shoukougun', 'Sequel: Hataraku Saibou!!', 'Spin-off: Hataraku Saibou Black (TV)']
